name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GTA 6: Adventure and Freedom in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore the exciting world of GTA 6 with vibrant visuals and seamless shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the high-octane world of GTA 6 with stunning visuals that bring the streets and action to life.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek, urban-inspired interface that captures the essence of GTA 6 while providing seamless browsing.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on track with a stylish clock and date display, matching the dynamic GTA atmosphere.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites with customizable, easy-to-use shortcuts.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into GTA-inspired games, putting you at the heart of the action in the open world.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Enjoy smooth and fast searches with your selected search engine, enhancing your browsing experience.
🚀 More Extension: Unlock additional features designed to level up your browsing experience with a GTA twist.
